about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey with magical girls in the enchanting world of Astrune Academy! Discover the tale of aspiring sorcerers at this towering academy in the Sternship region. Engage in the daily life of the magic academy, complete assignments, and strive to become a skilled sorcerer. With a campus filled with a school shop, courtyard, and magical vending machines, you'll experience the ultimate student life.



When it's time for combat, use Almacation to challenge mystical creatures. Master your preferred elemental magic and exploit enemy weaknesses. Unleash the power of Soul Source Magic to access unique character abilities, allowing you to call forth Demon Friends for tactical battles. As you navigate the ruined regions of this mysterious world, discover secrets and uncover the truth behind the Lost Phenomenon that plagues the land. Astrune Academy offers a captivating blend of magic, growth, and adventure, making it an unforgettable experience for all.

Features:


  • Transform and Battle: Use Almacation to engage in thrilling battles against mystical creatures.
  • Strategic Combat: Exploit elemental weaknesses and choose your combat tactics carefully.
  • Unique Character Abilities: Harness the power of Soul Source Magic to unlock character-specific abilities and call upon Demon Friends for support.
  • Character Growth: Enhance your magical girls through various growth systems, from level-ups to item upgrades and skill enhancement.
  • Mysterious Ruined Regions: Venture into dangerous territories, uncovering the secrets of the Lost Phenomenon.
  • Rich Storyline: Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative as you follow young sorcerers on their quest for mastery.
  • Diverse Facilities: Explore a vibrant campus with a school shop, courtyard, and magical vending machines.
  • Stunning Visuals: Enjoy a visually stunning world with enchanting landscapes and magical effects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This app features keyboard controls and partial controller support with the Xbox controller. Mouse/touch screen are not supported.
